dc_description_s: "The Russian River Watershed GIS project is intended to compile a set of standardized, spatial data in support of recovery planning for three threatened salmonid species in the Russian River basin - steelhead trout, chinook and coho salmon."--publisher's website. a joint project of NOAA Fisheries & Circuit Rider Productions, Inc. Title from disc surface. System requirements: ESRI ArcView or ArcExplorer (included); web browser.
dc_creator_sm: United States National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration
